name: Anniversary -10e4
description:
Created for the Giant Rom 5 game jam. An adventure puzzle platformer.

Unfinished, but playable, you can walk around and try out the mechanics.

Keyboard Controls:

WASD to move

Space to jump

Q to "Shift"

E to interact

Gamepad controls:
left stick/dpad - move

A button - jump

B button - interact

Y button - "Shift"
